type:
∀ {a b x : Real},
  And (Real.instPreorder.le a x) (Real.instPreorder.le x b) →
    Real.partialOrder.lt x b →
      ∀ (n : Nat),
        GT.gt (instHSub.hSub b x) 0 →
          GT.gt (Real.instInv.inv (instHSub.hSub b x)) 0 →
            GT.gt (instHAdd.hAdd n.cast (Real.instInv.inv (instHSub.hSub b x))) 0 →
              GT.gt (Real.instInv.inv (instHAdd.hAdd n.cast (Real.instInv.inv (instHSub.hSub b x)))) 0 →
                Real.instLE.le (Real.instInv.inv (instHSub.hSub b x))
                    (instHAdd.hAdd n.cast (Real.instInv.inv (instHSub.hSub b x))) →
                  Real.instLE.le (Real.instInv.inv (instHAdd.hAdd n.cast (Real.instInv.inv (instHSub.hSub b x))))
                      (instHSub.hSub b x) →
                    And
                      (And
                        (Real.instPreorder.le a
                          (instHAdd.hAdd x
                            (Real.instDivInvMonoid.inv (instHAdd.hAdd n.cast (Real.instInv.inv (instHSub.hSub b x))))))
                        (Real.instPreorder.le
                          (instHAdd.hAdd x
                            (Real.instDivInvMonoid.inv (instHAdd.hAdd n.cast (Real.instInv.inv (instHSub.hSub b x)))))
                          b))
                      (Not (Eq (instHAdd.hAdd n.cast (Real.instInv.inv (instHSub.hSub b x))) 0))
name: Chapter9
mem_Icc_isLimit
_proof_1_1
